casebody.data:
David BRIDGES
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 1, 2017

David B. Rozwaski, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Matthew A. Weiner, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner David Bridges' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn. App. 742, 152 A.3d 71 (2016), is denied.
